title: Vanity URL mapping

source.title: Source
source.description: The source representation to be used by the indexer to extract values

fetch.description: The source document to retrieve values from. Known variables in the URI Template are: `repo`, `ref`, `owner`, `path`

select.description: A CSS selector expression that selects nodes in the HTML (DOM) or Markdown (MDAST) syntax tree

value.description: A ES6 template literal expression that extracts the value from the matching node(s) to be stored in the index
